movies.title: Darr @ the Mall
movies.plot: Asia's largest mall is ready for it's inauguration, however there is a myth surrounding the mall. There have been various accidental deaths in the mall and the owners are tired of stories about the mall being haunted. Vishnu is hired as the mall's chief of security and during the mall's inaugural party, must work to solve the mystery behind the supernatural occurrences before the death toll starts rising.
movies.simplePlot: During the inaugural party of one of the largest malls in Asia, a newly recruited security guard must work to stop a supernatural threat.

biography.bio: Shergill was born in a Sikh family in Gorakhpur, Uttar Pradesh. He moved to Punjab, the place of his ancestors, in 1985 where he studied in Yadavindra Public School, Patiala and Bikram College Patiala. He learnt acting from Sri Harpal Singh, and then moved to Mumbai to work in the entertainment industry. He's married to Priyanka Puri from Delhi and they have a son named Veer Shergill.
biography.name: Jimmy Shergill

biography.bio: Nushrat Bharucha is an actress, known for LSD: Love, Sex Aur Dhokha (2010), Darr @ the Mall (2014) and Jai Santoshi Maa (2006).
biography.name: Nushrat Bharucha

biography.bio: Arif Zakaria was born on November 11, 1966 in Bombay, Maharashtra, India. He is an actor and producer, known for My Name Is Khan (2010), Lootera (2013) and Earth (1998).
biography.name: Arif Zakaria

biography.bio: Vikram Raj Bhardwaj is an actor, known for Darr @ the Mall (2014).
biography.name: Vikram Raj Bhardwaj

biography.bio: Geet Sharma is an actor, known for Darr @ the Mall (2014).
biography.name: Geet Sharma

biography.bio: Asif Basra is an Indian film and theatre actor. He has appeared in several international English-language productions, such as the acclaimed 2006 movie Outsourced (United States), Tandoori Love (Switzerland/ Germany) and One Night with the King (United States) with Omar Sharif and Peter O'Toole. Asif has starred in a number of popular Hindi movies, including Once Upon a Time in Mumbai, Jab We Met and Kai Po Che. His performance in Rahul Dholakia's Parzania received much critical acclaim. In 2014, he starred in the Tamil film Anjaan, and most recently he has acted alongside Ranbir Kapoor in his new film Roy. Asif has also worked with some of India's leading directors, including Anurag Kashyap on his film Black Friday. Other film roles have included playing the tailor in Hindi movie Lamhaa: The Untold Story of Kashmir and a fakir in Janaki Vishwanathan's Yeh Hai Bakrapur. Asif has starred in many plays in India and abroad, performing in English, Hindi and Urdu theatre productions. He toured India, the United States, the UK and Dubai playing five characters in Feroz Khan's production of Mahatma V/s Gandhi. He performed the title role in Manav Kaul's acclaimed Mamtaz Bhai Patang Waale, and played a 12-year old child with Spina Bifida in Main Bhi Superman. Asif Basra was born in Amravati on 27th July 1967. In 1989 he moved to Mumbai to pursue his acting career, and continues to live and work there.
biography.name: Asif Basra

biography.bio: Nivedita Bhattacharya was born on July 21, 1970 in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India. She is an actress, known for Darr @ the Mall (2014), Koi Laut Ke Aaya Hai (2017) and Kya Kehna (2000). She is married to Kay Kay Menon.
biography.name: Nivedita Bhattacharya

biography.bio: Shradha Kaul is an actress, known for Darr @ the Mall (2014), Topless (2005) and Nanak Shah Fakir (2015).
biography.name: Shradha Kaul

biography.bio: Pramod Pathak is an actor and director, known for P.O.W. Bandi Yuddh Ke (2016), Raees (2017) and Gangs of Wasseypur (2012).
biography.name: Pramod Pathak

biography.bio: Yoshika Verma is an actress, known for Darr @ the Mall (2014), Everybody Gets Screwed Here (2015) and Yeh Hai Bakrapur (2014).
biography.name: Yoshika Verma

biography.bio: Neeraj Khetrapal is an actor, known for Barfi! (2012), Johnny Gaddaar (2007) and Darr @ the Mall (2014).
biography.name: Neeraj Khetrapal

biography.bio: Neeraj Sood is an actor, known for Tere Naam (2003), Matrubhoomi un monde sans femmes (2003) and Agneepath (2012).

biography.bio: Charlotte Desmond is an actress, known for Darr @ the Mall (2014).

biography.bio: Rahul Mishra is an actor, known for Darr @ the Mall (2014), Via Darjeeling (2008) and Waisa Bhi Hota Hai Part II (2003).
